Settings: Configurable settings for this player's voice. When set, this will update the next time the player speaks.

methods.name: BPOnTalkingBegin
methods.doc: Blueprint native event for when this player starts speaking.

methods.name: BPOnTalkingEnd
methods.doc: Blueprint native event for when this player stops speaking.

methods.name: GetVoiceLevel
methods.doc:
Get the current level of how loud this player is speaking. Will return 0.0
if player is not talking.

methods.name: RegisterWithPlayerState
methods.doc:
This function sets up this talker with a specific player.
It is necessary to use this to properly control a specific player's voice
and receive events.
